data.text: @AFMMMMMMM Hi there, passengers who choose not to select their seats in advance will only be able to select from remaining seats during check-in. You may wish to approach our check-in counter staff for assistance with changing your seats, subject to availability. Thank you.

urls.title: Singapore Airlines - Help and FAQs
urls.description: When making your booking with Singapore Airlines, you will have the option to select your seats in advance. Depending on the class of travel, the fare type you choose and your membership tier, you may be required to pay an advance seat selection fee. If you choose not to select your seats in advance, you may enjoy complimentary seat selection from remaining available seats once online check-in is open, 48 hours before your flight departs. Passengers in Suites, First Class, and Business Class will enjoy

data.text: @tomtomsydney Hi there, we're sorry to hear this. May we clarify if you have tried clearing your browser's history/cache or ensuring that the latest app version is installed before attempting to book your flight on our website/app? Thank you.
